appendText.text: Soul of the product: Grippy PU surface for non-slip performance even with sweat Wider than traditional mats for extra space Arch shaped Mat Tree rubber bottom provides secure floor grip 5mm high rubber density for joint cushioning Free from harmful silicone, phthalates, PVC, and chemicals Ideal for both regular and hot yoga sessions Excellent durability for long-lasting use Material: Recycled PU Leather, 100% natural tree rubber, water based inks Care guide: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Spray clean the PU top and then wipe the mat. Let it Air Dry (Do not put in washer or dryer) Mindful craftsmanship: PU is an artificial material made with split leather (the fibrous part of the hide left over from making leather) that does not involve animals and it is ethically sourced. We use recycled PU. The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, formaldehyde, or harmful chemicals making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth. Measurement: >Measurement <span class="text-button"

appendText.text: Soul of the product: 100% eco-friendly, sustainable and vegan materials Natural cork provides enhanced gripâ€”even when wet providing non-slip performance High density rubber ensures joint-friendly cushioning Excellent durability, high quality, and free from harmful substances Versatile for regular and hot yoga sessions Anti-microbial cork surface for a hygienic environment Material: Biodegradable, Recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber, water based inks with premium cork The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint. Care guide: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Wipe it down with a yoga mat cleaner after your practice. Let it Air Dry (Do not put in Dryer) Mindful craftsmanship: Cork is the outer bark of the Oak Tree. The Oak tree is never cut down to harvest cork, rather the bark is stripped by hand! No part of the bark is wasted during cork production. Oak trees regenerate their bark by absorbing five times more Carbon Dioxide than an oak tree that hasn't been harvested. The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, EVA or synthetic rubber making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth. All designs are made using water based inks to avoid chemicals The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint. Measurement: >Measurement <span class="text-button"

sections.heading: Soul of the product
items: 100% eco-friendly, sustainable and vegan materials
Natural cork provides enhanced gripâ€”even when wet providing non-slip performance
High density rubber ensures joint-friendly cushioning
Excellent durability, high quality, and free from harmful substances
Versatile for regular and hot yoga sessions
Anti-microbial cork surface for a hygienic environment

sections.heading: Material
items: Biodegradable, Recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber, water based inks with premium cork
The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.

sections.heading: Care guide
items: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Wipe it down with a yoga mat cleaner after your practice. Let it Air Dry (Do not put in Dryer)

sections.heading: Mindful craftsmanship
items: Cork is the outer bark of the Oak Tree. The Oak tree is never cut down to harvest cork, rather the bark is stripped by hand! No part of the bark is wasted during cork production. Oak trees regenerate their bark by absorbing five times more Carbon Dioxide than an oak tree that hasn't been harvested.

The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, EVA or synthetic rubber making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth.
All designs are made using water based inks to avoid chemicals
The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.
